body_html:
/CC @gunan, any ideas what the issue could be?

Also, I doubt this makes a different, but the command

sudo sh -c "echo '/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64' >> /etc/ld.so.conf.d/nvidia.conf"

appends the line to the file, keeping the old lines. Try replacing >> with >.

body:
/CC @gunan, any ideas what the issue could be?

Also, I doubt this makes a different, but the command 
```
sudo sh -c "echo '/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64' >> /etc/ld.so.conf.d/nvidia.conf"
```
appends the line to the file, keeping the old lines. Try replacing >> with >.
